duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide superior customer service and maintain a warm, courteous attitude towards residents and guests.
Maintain an active presence at the Front Desk, monitoring visitors and providing access control.
Handle concierge duties with enthusiasm, including processing mail, answering questions, making recommendations, and coordinating various services.
Possess in-depth knowledge of the local area to enhance residents' living experience and facilitate their requests.
Adhere to Front Desk procedures, complete reports, and respond to emergency situations.
Resolve resident and guest concerns promptly and professionally, while maintaining a safe work environment.
Assist in training of concierge staff and perform administrative tasks as requested.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalency (Hospitality management or business administration degree preferred)
